Description:
Detects when full data export is attempted an unauthorized user.

Author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Bitbucket Unauthorized Full Data Export Triggered
Query: sourcetype="bitbucket-audit" audittype.category="Data pipeline" audittype.action="Unauthorized full data export triggered"
